instructions: # Character Sheet Inspired by the Saga Edition sheet by Mad Irishman Productions. This sheet auto-calculates Defences and Skills using the rules as written. Not all supplement rules may have been taken into account. If this is the case, please contact the authors.  See the Wiki for a complete list of Attributes and Rolls:  https://wiki.roll20.net/Star_Wars_Saga_Edition_Character_Sheet **Last Updated** 21 July, 2015## Useful Attributes* level @{level}* Half Level @{level|max}* Hit Points @{hp} and @{hp|max}* Reflex @{Reflex}* Flat Footed Reflex @{ReflexFlatFooted}* Fortitude @{Fortitude}* Will @{Will}* Condition Track Penalty @{CT}* Damage Threshold @{DT}* Damage Reduction @{DR}* Shield Rating @{SR} and @{SR|max}* Base Attack bonus @{BAB}**Ability Scores*** Strength @{str}* Constitution @{con}* Dexterity @{dex}* Intelligence @{int}* Wisdom @{wis}* Charisma @{cha}* Ability modifiers @{___|max}* All Skills ie @{Acrobatics} and @{Knowledge-GalacticLore} ## Useful Rolls* Abilities ie. %{'charName'|strCheck}* Skills ie. %{'charName'|AcrobaticsCheck} or %{'charName'|Knowledge-GalacticLoreCheck}* Grapple %{'charName'|GrappleCheck}When using the Vehicle tab, the attributes use the prefix 'Vehicle-'. Sheet Change Log available here: https://wiki.roll20.net/Star_Wars_Saga_Edition_Character_Sheet
